name: real-ores
title: Real Ores
author: trikop
description:
(Work in progress mod, playable, albeit maybe unbalanced in its current state)
Replaces vanilla ore patches with ores from the real world (will have to change the way they're extracted from the ore patches in a future update)
Ore ratios are fetched from http://webmineral.com 

Full compatibility with other ore mods will be added in an later update
